com.lizardtech.djvu

Class BSInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.lizardtech.djvu.BSInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DjVuInterface, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class BSInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
implements DjVuInterface
    This class decodes a bzz encoded InputStream.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    $author$
